abstract: Circulating online, the thoughts of an employee who’s worked at both places, comparing the offices, pay and perks.
snippet: Circulating online, the thoughts of an employee who’s worked at both places, comparing the offices, pay and perks.
lead_paragraph: The perks at Google have long been the talk of Silicon Valley and beyond. But when all is said and done, how do they stack up against the perks at Microsoft? And which is the better workplace?

headline.main: Google v. Microsoft: What’s the Better Workplace?
